messages.subject: Re: Cleanhome was: I need ideas ...
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, I have tried Fly Lady and just can t do it, I really don t care if my sink is shining, that just takes five more minutes out of a busy day. :)  I have
messages.messageBody:
Hi, I have tried Fly Lady and just can't do it, I really don't care
if my sink is shining, that just takes five more minutes out of a
busy day. :) I have recently set up a SHE card file system, and
thought that's what I needed because I don't need to consult the
computer, just my cards. But there are so many cards! And so that
idea is winding down. Although I do like haveing my homeschool log
and my addresses in there. Plus I like having cards for all the
cleaning that can be done if I ever have time and the laundry and
dishes are caught up (maybe in 10 years!)

I just looked at this site and she says she couldn't do flylady
either, so maybe there is hope here?
Cathy

hope

from

There were

me what

I don't

could find a

Would love

messages.subject: Cleanhome was: I need ideas ...
messages.msgSnippet: ... Melissa, did you ever try FlyLady?  How does this website differ from FlyLady?  I just never could get into the groove of Flying.  There were too many
messages.messageBody:
On 4/28/06, Melissa <autismhelp@...> wrote:
>
> As for organizing, I could go
> on and on, but I just found a website that I really love that says
> everything I would say at http://cleanhome.savedme.com . (Ril, hope
> you don't mind the endorsement!)


Melissa, did you ever try FlyLady? How does this website differ from
FlyLady? I just never could get into the groove of "Flying." There were
too many rules and too many expectations. (Too many e-mails asking me what
was for dinner, if I had my shoes on and where my laundry was. - I don't
know. No they aren't. and all over the house! LOL!) I wish I could find a
housekeeping philosophy/system that worked for me and my house. Would love
to hear from someone who has btdt with different programs.





--
Michelle
Independent Kitchen Consultant #413652
The Pampered Chef
850-474-0817
http://www.pamperedchef.biz/michellelr
